function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infrastructure inequities enhance host susceptibility and can facilitate transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of contagious diseases in vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Improving access to critical infrastructures and resources in vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Infrastructure development and resource allocation technology","People":"Individuals in resource-poor settings and vulnerable to malnutrition","Owner":"Government, aid organizations"},{"Description":"Limited contact tracing and isolation may lead to unchecked virus transmission","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus within the population","Mitigation":"Enhancing contact tracing and isolation measures to reduce virus transmission","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing applications, isolation facilities","People":"General population, individuals with potential exposure to infected areas or people","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Population susceptibility to infection is influenced by biological traits and environmental factors","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infection in populations with limited access to critical resources","Mitigation":"Improving access to nutrition, shelter, water, and sanitation in vulnerable communities","Technologies":"Infrastructure development, water and sanitation technology","People":"Individuals in resource-poor settings and vulnerable to malnutrition","Owner":"Government, aid organizations"}]}
